thread.section_title: The French Quarters Guest Apartments - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: OMG!!!!
thread.title_full: OMG!!!! - Review of The French Quarters Guest Apartments, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: kenwik5
title: OMG!!!!
text:
What an amazing place to stay, from the moment we arrived we felt a warmth and welcome we did not expect. Our room was absolutely beautiful and was kept stick and span for our whole visit -8 nights. The staff at the hotel were wonderful with a special mention to Kevin at the breakfast servery who was attentive and super friendly greeting us each morning with a great big smile. Colin, the manager/owner was so lovely with a chat each morning and advice and info on fun things to do in the city. Other guests in the hotel were friendly we met an amazing lady who we will be friends with for a long time I am sure. The location of the French Quarters is a hop, skip and jump away from Times Square and some top Broadway theatres, not to mention the restaurants within minutes of your front door. I would highly recommend this establishment to any and all looking for great place to stay in New York, and hopefully I will get a chance to visit again.
